resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
There is a lot to talk about. Let\'s begin.
Cicerone helps to identify what the user is seeing at a given moment using Machine Learning Technology
We are using TensorFlow\'s highly accurate classifier to determine the objects in your path.
Begin by tapping next and aiming for phone at your surrounding. Walk around and see what happens!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
